featured.text: × 25 cm are available from the Clinebell Company in Colorado.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於製作花卉裝飾的容器，通常具有圓形或半圓形的形狀，並且可以用來展示花卉或植物。
definition.en_def: A type of container used for floral arrangements, typically having a round or semi-circular shape, designed to display flowers or plants.
definition.example: She arranged the roses beautifully in the clinebell for the wedding.
